name: collections::btree::node::BalancingContext::<'a, K, V>::merge_tracking_parent

collections::btree::node::BalancingConte.doc: Performs a merge and lets a closure decide what to return.

doc:
Merges the parent's key-value pair and both adjacent child nodes into
 the left child node and returns the shrunk parent node.

 Panics unless we `.can_merge()`.
